testInfo.name: Тест по Future Perfect
testInfo.description: Тест на будущее совершенное время, завершённые действия к определённому моменту в будущем

questions.question: Choose the correct form: By next year, I ___ my studies.
What is the structure of Future Perfect?
Fill in the blank: By the time you arrive, we ___ (prepare) everything.
When do we use Future Perfect?
options: For actions in progress at specific future time
For actions completed before a specific future time
questions.correctAnswer: For actions completed before a specific future time

questions.question: Fill in the blank: By 2030, scientists ___ (discover) new treatments for many diseases.
Which time expression is commonly used with Future Perfect?
Fill in the blank: By the end of this month, she ___ (read) five books.
What is the question form for 'they will have finished'?
Fill in the blank: I ___ (not complete) the project by Friday.
questions.correctAnswer: will not have completed / won't have completed

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence:
options: By 10 PM, I will do my homework.
By 10 PM, I will be doing my homework.
By 10 PM, I will have done my homework.
By 10 PM, I do my homework.
questions.correctAnswer: By 10 PM, I will have done my homework.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: By the time we get to the cinema, the movie ___ (start).
Which tense emphasizes completion before another future action?
Fill in the blank: By next summer, they ___ (build) the new hospital.
What is the negative form of 'he will have arrived'?
Fill in the blank: ___ you ___ (finish) the report by tomorrow evening?
